/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The vantage point is from a bridge, providing a panoramic view of the city's daily life. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. The street below is a hive of activity, filled with cars and buses navigating their way through the city's arteries. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades a testament to the architectural diversity of the city. Amidst the urban landscape, patches of greenery provide a refreshing contrast, hinting at the presence of trees and parks scattered throughout the city. The image is taken from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the scene.
